text: Joe Harry Lycett (born 5 July 1988) is a British comedian. He has appeared on television shows including Live at the Apollo, Taskmaster, Never Mind the Buzzcocks, 8 Out of 10 Cats and QI. He is the announcer on Saturday BBC One show Epic Win, and as the presenter on BBC Two's The Great British Sewing Bee. He has his own show on Channel 4 titled, Joe Lycett's Got Your Back. He is openly bisexual. On 1 March 2020, he announced that he had changed his legal name to Hugo Boss in protest against the company of the same name. ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:English comedians Category:British television personalities Category:British LGBT people Category:LGBT comedians Category:British LGBT rights activists Category:Bisexual people Category:People from Birmingham
title: Joe Lycett
